title: Email sent to Judge PAULA L. FEROLETO (pferolet@nycourts.gov) from Kevin Riford regarding Christina Little

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Email sent to Judge PAULA L. FEROLETO (pferolet@nycourts.gov) from Kevin Riford regarding Christina Little
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1.) Any and all emails received by PAULA L. FEROLETO (pferolet@nycourts.gov) from sender Kevin Riford (kevinriford@outlook.com) on 6/25/2024.

2.) Any and all emails sent from PAULA L. FEROLETO (pferolet@nycourts.gov) to Kevin Riford (kevinriford@outlook.com) 6/25/2024.

3.) Any and all emails received by PAULA L. FEROLETO (pferolet@nycourts.gov) from sender Kevin Riford (kevinriford@outlook.com) on 6/27/2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family

title: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (Harford County Sheriff)

communications.subject: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (Harford County Sheriff)
FW: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Request for Your Agency's 2023-2024 Roster & Salary Data (Harford County Sheriff)
communications.communication:
Deborah Levi,

Please be advised that our agency now utilizes an online system, GovQuest, and we no longer accept PIA requests by email as stated on our website.  You can submit a request and make payment online by using GovQuest, by mail, or in person (along with payment) at our Headquarters, located at 45 S. Main St., Bel Air, MD, 21014.

Sincerely,


Michelle Hanks
Harford County Sheriff’s Office
Public Information Act Liaison
Office: 443-409-3403 (33403)
Email:  hanksm@harfordsheriff.org<mailto:hanksm@harfordsheriff.org>
Request Submission: https://app.govquest.com/
https://harfordsheriff.org/services/pia/

[A picture containing text, clipart  Description automatically generated]     [Qr code  Description automatically generated]
